Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
maria \maria\ n. pl. 1. (Astron.) Plural form of {mare}, a dark region of considerable extent on the surface of the moon. [WordNet 1.5]
2. (Bot.) A valuable timber tree of Panama.
Syn: Calophyllum longifolium. [WordNet 1.5]
maria n 1: a dark region of considerable extent on the surface of the moon [syn: {mare}] 2: valuable timber tree of Panama [syn: {Calophyllum longifolium}]
